# AppExtensionPoint.Scope.Restriction.none

**Case**

A value that allows app extensions in any app to bind to the host app.

## Declaration

```swift
case none
```

## Getting the restriction types

- **AppExtensionPoint.Scope.Restriction.application**: A value that requires an app extension to reside inside the same app to which it’s binding.
